definition: flat/(coll.) to beat (sb) up/old variant of 匾[bian3]
Chen Shui-Bian (1950-), Taiwanese DPP 民進黨|民进党 politician, president of the Republic of China 2000-2008
A-bian, nickname of Chen Shui-bian 陳水扁|陈水扁[Chen2 Shui3 bian3]
秦越人[Qin2 Yue4 ren2] (407-310 BC), Warring States physician known for his medical skills, nicknamed Bian Que after the earliest known Chinese physician allegedly from the 黃帝|黄帝[Huang2 di4] era
to have a low opinion of

sentences.english: Hard find … a mossy leaf-tailed gecko is nearly impossible to spot on tree.
sentences.chinese: 這隻苔蘚滿身的扁葉尾壁虎趴在樹上，幾乎認不出來。

sentences.english: Here is a short collection of tips to help beginners start slacklining.
sentences.chinese: 這裏是用來幫助初學者開始走扁帶一些小的提示。

sentences.english: You sneak a flask up there and raise a toast to the whole city of New York.
sentences.chinese: 在樓上偷偷拿走一個扁酒瓶，向整個紐約城敬上一杯。

sentences.english: For example, one compares flat and little space, unfavorable put gangling thing.
sentences.chinese: 例如，一個比較扁而小的空間，就不宜放瘦長之物。

sentences.english: To shape molten metal by pouring into a mold to produce an ingot or a continuously cast slab.
sentences.chinese: 將熔融的金屬倒進模子裏成型，以製成錠鐵或扁鋼錠。

sentences.english: They head broad and flat, like a triangle.
sentences.chinese: 它們的頭又寬又扁，像一個三角形。

sentences.english: Which is so flattened that the spider can wrap itself around a twig.
sentences.chinese: 扁蜘蛛有寬闊的腹部，它扁平得能讓蜘蛛包裹住細枝。

sentences.english: Most herbivores have flat teeth for crushing plants.
sentences.chinese: 大部分草食動物的牙齒是扁的，已用來磨碎植物。

sentences.english: Flat container is the most important tool for extruding large thin - wall Aluminum wainscot .
sentences.chinese: 扁擠壓筒是擠壓大型鋁壁板型材的重要工具。

sentences.english: The most likely scenario is that one side of the sling was looped back through the carabiner.
sentences.chinese: 最可能發生的情況是扁帶的一邊繞過主鎖內部。

sentences.english: They became entangled while going after a rebound and were close to throwing punches when teammates separated them.
sentences.chinese: 當隊友把他們拉開時，倆人幾乎就快要出拳扁對方了。

sentences.english: The present paper reports a revisional list of the Chinese Pamphiliids amounting to 47 species.
sentences.chinese: 本文報道中國扁葉蜂訂正名錄共計47種。

sentences.english: We also statistically studied the intrinsic flatness of the disk galaxies.
sentences.chinese: 本文也對盤星系的內稟扁度進行了統計和分析。

sentences.english: U can't find bus such like this in Shijiazhuang.
sentences.chinese: 石家莊就沒有這種扁扁車。

sentences.english: Leaves are flat. Why is this good for the plant?
sentences.chinese: 葉子都扁的，這對植物有什麼好處？
果實扁球形，果皮青黑色。

definition: variant of 窪|洼[wa1]/(used in names)
